name: part_004
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [aBU9HgJmUWk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental background music plays as the camera pans across the audience at Tokyo Garden Theater, showing fans waving lightsticks and holding various merchandise.
A pre-performance announcement begins while informational graphics are displayed on the side screens.

subtitles.original: 本日は角巻わためセカンドライブ
「わためぇ Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER」に
subtitles.english: "Watame Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER,"

subtitles.original: ご来場いただきまして、誠にありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: thank you very much for coming.

subtitles.original: 開演に先立ちまして、お客様にご注意並びにご案内申し上げます。
subtitles.english: Prior to the start of the performance, we have some precautions and information for the audience.

subtitles.original: 公演中の撮影、録音、録画機器の使用は...
subtitles.english: The use of photography, audio, or video recording equipment during the performance is...
